name: Jade's Journey
description:
Description
Jade's Journey is a classic RPG designed and produced by Warfare Studios.
Note: to toggle between screen modes, press ALT + ENTER. Storyline
Join Jade in her journey to master her powers and save her father!
Jade is a regular girl living in a regular village until one day... it all changes!
Play the game and find out what happens. Other Games by Warfare Studios
http://store.steampowered.com/app/370780
http://store.steampowered.com/app/370700
